about_the_game:
When a group of shipwreck survivors wash up on the shores of a strange quiet island, the last thing they expected was a miracle. With no supplies and no idea where to get food, the settlers begin searching for help before stumbling across a sleeping stone automaton. When one brave settler takes a closer look, the stone giant awakens and offers to help the villagers build a home.

Cobble: The Stone Forager is an adventure resource-gathering game where you play as the friendly stone giant, Cobble.



  • Help the shipwrecked settlers build up their town by gathering and foraging for supplies.
  • Unlock new areas and trade with the settlers to get stronger materials.
  • Rediscover the story of Cobble's creator and rebuild what has been lost.



This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information.
